column5: I am going to Press lake the first week in July. I have been there the last 5 years, but always in mid-August. This year I will be going the first week of July. Is there anyone who has been there at this time of the summer, tell me how successful their fishing has been? Also what spots were best for catching walleyes? Bait used? Depth? Any info would be greatly appreciated. In August..we never had to leave the reef! Thank you, Buck
